django.contrib.gis.db.backends.spatialite.operations
====================================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.backends.spatialite.operations

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   SQL functions reference lists:
   https://www.gaia-gis.it/gaia-sins/spatialite-sql-4.3.0.html



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.spatialite.operations.SpatialiteNullCheckOperator
   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.spatialite.operations.SpatiaLiteOperations


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: SpatialiteNullCheckOperator(op=None, func=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.gis.db.backends.utils.SpatialOperator`


   Class encapsulating the behavior specific to a GIS operation (used by lookups).


   .. py:method:: as_sql(connection, lookup, template_params, sql_params)


.. py:class:: SpatiaLiteOperations

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.gis.db.backends.base.operations.BaseSpatialOperations`, :py:obj:`django.db.backends.sqlite3.operations.DatabaseOperations`


   .. py:attribute:: name
      :value: 'spatialite'



   .. py:attribute:: spatialite
      :value: True



   .. py:attribute:: Adapter


   .. py:attribute:: collect
      :value: 'Collect'



   .. py:attribute:: extent
      :value: 'Extent'



   .. py:attribute:: makeline
      :value: 'MakeLine'



   .. py:attribute:: unionagg
      :value: 'GUnion'



   .. py:attribute:: from_text
      :value: 'GeomFromText'



   .. py:attribute:: gis_operators


   .. py:attribute:: disallowed_aggregates


   .. py:attribute:: select
      :value: 'CAST (AsEWKB(%s) AS BLOB)'



   .. py:attribute:: function_names


   .. py:method:: unsupported_functions()


   .. py:method:: spatial_version()

      Determine the version of the SpatiaLite library.



   .. py:method:: convert_extent(box)

      Convert the polygon data received from SpatiaLite to min/max values.



   .. py:method:: geo_db_type(f)

      Return None because geometry columns are added via the
      `AddGeometryColumn` stored procedure on SpatiaLite.



   .. py:method:: get_distance(f, value, lookup_type)

      Return the distance parameters for the given geometry field,
      lookup value, and lookup type.



   .. py:method:: geos_version()

      Return the version of GEOS used by SpatiaLite as a string.



   .. py:method:: proj_version()

      Return the version of the PROJ library used by SpatiaLite.



   .. py:method:: lwgeom_version()

      Return the version of LWGEOM library used by SpatiaLite.



   .. py:method:: rttopo_version()

      Return the version of RTTOPO library used by SpatiaLite.



   .. py:method:: geom_lib_version()

      Return the version of the version-dependant geom library used by
      SpatiaLite.



   .. py:method:: spatialite_version()

      Return the SpatiaLite library version as a string.



   .. py:method:: spatialite_version_tuple()

      Return the SpatiaLite version as a tuple (version string, major,
      minor, subminor).



   .. py:method:: spatial_aggregate_name(agg_name)

      Return the spatial aggregate SQL template and function for the
      given Aggregate instance.



   .. py:method:: geometry_columns()


   .. py:method:: spatial_ref_sys()


   .. py:method:: get_geometry_converter(expression)
